participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and hands-on, Alex loves to engage in creative projects and values hard work.
participant_1.background: I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house. My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet. I like the movie Godfather. My favorite band is VV Nation. I always wear something purple.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and free-spirited, Jordan enjoys expressing herself through art and music while maintaining a unique sense of style.
participant_2.background: I have an odd schedule since I'm a night owl, but I still get my work done. I love to listen to religious music. I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it. I work in IT. I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.

content.text: What does your job entail?
I'm a theater technician, I do lighting, sound, and set design.
Oh that's cool! I've always been interested in theater.
Me too, I love it! What's your favorite movie?
The Godfather, it's so good!
I've never seen it! What do you like about it?
It's a classic, the acting is amazing, and the story is really interesting.
I'll have to check it out! What's your favorite band?
VV Nation, they're a Christian rock band.
Oh cool! I've never heard of them.
They're really good, you should check them out!
I will! What's your favorite color?
Purple!
Me too! It's such a pretty color.
I always wear something purple on my birthday!
That's a cool tradition!
Yeah, I like it!
What do you do for fun?
I like to build things, I built a new deck for my house last birthday.
That's awesome! I wish I could build things.
It's not that hard, you just have to follow the directions.
I'll have to try it sometime!
You should! It's a lot of fun
